TopicTitle: Dres Ramp scientific data is not translated in German

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.1 (latest) | Mods: Orbital Survey; Science Arkive; Node Manager | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Home | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU @ 3.60GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 | RAM: 16 GB

 

There is something wrong with the scientific data in the German translation of the Dres Ramp. Also, the amount of science points you get is not quite right.

 

Included Attachments:

Edited April 5 by Spicat

@Winterstein, can you confirm that your bug report is about the german translation missing from the science report?

For the number of science point it's another problem: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/223498-science-multiplier-not-working-dres-eve-vall-very-low-science-rewards-for-some-region-on-other-celestial-bodies/

Also, I will probably make that bug report a respository for all missing translation in the game if there are other bug reports like this coming, to make things more organized. (Not just for German)
